column3: Latest;Taken from a Facebook post. These photos are of Phnom Penh from either 1866 or 1886. *According to history buff Philip Coggan  it is from ‘1873
column4: taken from a park that then existed on the bank of the Bassac River south of the palace’.------Work on the Royal Place began in 1866.------Under the French
column5: the capital was rapidly built up from around 1870.
